title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes have been made.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open a file in the code editor.
2. Trigger code assist (e.g., by pressing a specific key combination).
3. Note that the file is marked as dirty, even when no changes have been made.
4. Repeat the above steps with different files and check if the issue persists.
